General.Name: Guanglian Aviation Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Guanglian Aviation Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the design and manufacture of drones, aircraft parts, composite materials, and aviation technology equipment in China. The company offers composite molding materials and aircraft tooling assemblies, as well as aircraft components, and composite and spare parts. Its customers primarily include military units, engine manufacturers, scientific research institutes, scientific research production units, and military research institutes. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Harbin, China.

4.Name: Mr. Shouji  Yang
4.Title: Deputy Chief Engineer, Director of R&D Center and Employee Representative Director
